data.name: label3.Text
data.value: Get the best value from your summer holiday in Dubai and across the UAE with My Emirates Pass. You can enjoy exclusive offers at over 500 locations simply by showing your Emirates boarding pass. Dine for less in some of the city’s best restaurants, get discounts at big‑name stores and the best attractions, and relax at tranquil spas. You can do it all for less with My Emirates Pass this summer between 1 May to 30 September 2022.

data.name: label4.Text
data.value: Welcome to our home city Dubai. The best shopping deals, hundreds of dining options, theme parks and world‑class attractions. These are just some of the reasons to choose Dubai as your next holiday destination. And when you fly with us, you can enjoy complimentary hotel stays and additional baggage allowance. Enjoy a two‑nights' stay at JW Marriot Marquis when you book an Emirates return flight to Dubai in First Class or Business Class or one night at Hilton Garden Inn Al Muraqabat when you book in Economy Class. Pack more with complimentary 10kgs excess baggage in both directions when you book your flight to Dubai. Book by 30 May 2022 and travel from 20 May until 30 September 2022. To avail your complimentary hotel stay, an e‑mail must be sent to EmiratesOffer@emirates.com with your confirmed PNR reference, arrival date in Dubai, the names of all the passengers in your booking, phone number and e‑mail address. And we'll email you your hotel confirmation.

data.name: label6.Text
data.value: Broadening your horizons in new countries is an experience not to be missed. And to make it even better, we’re giving you an exclusive discount and extra benefits while on your way. Whether you’re travelling for school or headed for a getaway at any of our over 250 destinations, book your flight by 30 September 2022 using the promo code STUDENT to get discounts of up to 10% on Economy Class and Business Class fares. You also get 10kg more or 1 extra piece on top of our generous baggage allowances and flexible options to change your flight. Conditions apply. Be sure to present a valid studentID or school acceptance letter at check‑in and get started on achieving your dreams. If you're not already an Emirates Skywards member, join now to start earning Skywards Miles on your travels to spend on flights, upgrades and other exciting rewards with our partners.
